articles.title: He created Grand Theft Auto. Now he's back with a novel about an AI that hijacks your mind - BBC

articles.title: A Kinect for kids is outselling Xbox to become the hot toy this holiday - The Verge
articles.description: The Nex Playground is basically Kinect for kids, and it’s outselling Microsoft’s Xbox, shaking up the console market this holiday.

articles.title: This Insanely Long Ribbon Worm Turns Out to Be The Oldest on Record - ScienceAlert
articles.description: Biologist Jon Allen is the proud owner of the world's oldest ribbon worm on record.
